mapper.insert: insert into board (title, content, regid) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{regid})
mapper.select: select bno, title, readcount, moddate, regid from board where isremoved = 'N'
select * from board where bno = #{bno} and isremoved = 'N'
mapper.update: update board set title=#{title}, modid=#{regid}, content=#{content}, moddate=now() where bno = #{bno}
